plugins.name: LinguaSync
plugins.description:
LinguaSync is in Beta test for limted user.


Features

  1. Context-Aware Translation: By leveraging the strengths of the AI model, which excels at understanding context, this plugin can accurately translate specifications and service screens written in various languages including English, Japanese, Vietnamese, and Korean.
  2. One-Click Translation: To save you from the tedious process of copying and pasting text, we have implemented a feature that allows users to directly select the area within Figma for one-click translation.
  3. Replace Mode: The plugin is equipped with the ability to translate while retaining the existing Figma text format into the desired multilingual language. If you wish, you can simultaneously view the input and output languages without overwriting.
plugins.tagline: Unlock multilingual superpowers with our plugin, using AI to translate and understand context!

72618.name: LinguaSync
72618.description:
LinguaSync is in Beta test for limted user.


Features

  2. One-Click Translation: To save you from the tedious process of copying and pasting text, we have implemented a feature that allows users to directly select the area within Figma for one-click translation.
  3. Replace Mode: The plugin is equipped with the ability to translate while retaining the existing Figma text format into the desired multilingual language. If you wish, you can simultaneously view the input and output languages without overwriting.
72618.tagline: Unlock multilingual superpowers with our plugin, using AI to translate and understand context!

plugins.name: Xerus
plugins.description:
Xerus helps you to organize the texts of your designs while having powerful tools to automate your text workflow. It synchronizes your figma text and your Airtable database.


Xerus is for free! I am glad I can contribute to the community. Airtable has a free version too, that supports a maximum of text entries, please check their price plan to see which option is best for you.


Getting started

There are several ways to use Xerus in your project. In this website, I explain you step by step how to set up Xerus for your project. Do you want to change the language of all text in your design? Do you want to update all instances of a text? Xerus can do it for you.


Features

  • Text synchronization between Airtable database and Figma.
  • Multiple layer synchronization pointing to the same database entry.
  • Single layer synchronization.
  • Multiple database connections


Incoming features

Do you have suggestions to improve Xerus? Contact me!

  • Import/Export of PO files.
  • Support complex Airtable fields


Updates

  • 1.0: first release
  • 2.0: fixed bug with airtable token and improved the error messaging.
  • 3.0: added support texts with breaklines
plugins.tagline: Xerus allows you to manage large amount of texts in your designs.

44093.name: Xerus
44093.description:

There are several ways to use Xerus in your project. In this website, I explain you step by step how to set up Xerus for your project. Do you want to change the language of all text in your design? Do you want to update all instances of a text? Xerus can do it for you.

plugins.name: Improved Exporter
plugins.description: Improved Exporter is the essential Figma plugin for creators who need total control over their exports. Whether you're designing for print or the web, this tool lets you customize DPI, scale to pixel-perfect dimensions, and export in all major file formats, including .PNG, .JPEG, .SVG, .PDF, and .WEBP. Save time, avoid third-party apps, and ensure your designs look flawless anywhere they go. Perfect for print designers, web developers, and anyone looking to streamline their workflow.
plugins.tagline: Seamless Export Solutions for Designers.

113104.name: Improved Exporter
113104.description: Improved Exporter is the essential Figma plugin for creators who need total control over their exports. Whether you're designing for print or the web, this tool lets you customize DPI, scale to pixel-perfect dimensions, and export in all major file formats, including .PNG, .JPEG, .SVG, .PDF, and .WEBP. Save time, avoid third-party apps, and ensure your designs look flawless anywhere they go. Perfect for print designers, web developers, and anyone looking to streamline their workflow.

• Support for JPEG, SVG, PDF, and WEBP formats added.
• Added the ability to rename files while inside the plugin before export.
• Plugin page descriptions & visual updates.

plugins.name: Colorized
plugins.description:
This plugin will help you to decorate your text more colorful.


Launch the plugin

Select the text layer

Click the "create" button

Wait for a while (usually 2-3 seconds)

Get multi-colored text.

Version 2.1.0
What's new?

• The plugin has been significantly optimized to improve overall performance*
• Removed the limit on the maximum number of words allowed in one text layer
• Removed the limit on the maximum number of characters allowed in one text layer

NOTE:
*The plugin now creates a separate group for each character in a word. The plugin creates one group for each word instead of one group for each character.

plugins.name: Design Tokens to Variables
plugins.description:
Convert JSON data using W3C Design Tokens specs or formats generated by generators into Figma Variables, supporting multiple modes.


🔑 Key Features


  1. Effortless JSON conversion: Quickly transform W3C-compliant JSON design tokens into Figma Variables.
  2. Multi-mode support: Easily manage light and dark for versatile design systems.
  3. Intelligent grouping: Automatically organize your variables into logical groups for better management.
  4. Wide compatibility: Works with W3C design tokens specs, Leonardo, Huetone, and Primer Prism formats.


✅ Perfect for


  1. Design system managers streamlining their workflow.
  2. Designers working on multi-themed applications.
  3. Teams transitioning from traditional design tokens to Figma variables.


🟡 Supported tokens


  1. Tested only for colors at the moment.


🐞 Got ideas or found a bug?


Comment or contact me in Threads. Your feedback helps make this plugin even better for everyone!
plugins.tagline: Convert W3C Design Tokens, Leonardo, Huetone, Primer Prism to Variables.

plugins.name: Color cleaner: Merge similar colors & connect with variables
plugins.description:
About

Color Cleaner is a plugin designed to help streamline your Figma files not only by reducing the number of colors and minimizing subtle variations of the same shade, but also connecting them with variables.


How to use

Use the “Level of cleanup” slider to adjust how much cleanup is applied. Preview the changes in the box below and choose a setting that balances effectiveness. Typically, aim for a setting that is neither too soft to make a noticeable difference, nor too hard to avoid merging distinct colors.

Toggle the “Match with variables” checkbox if you want colors to be connected with available variables. When ready, click “Clean.” After a brief moment, the changes will be applied to the selected element.

accepted.name: Ruslan Maslenkou
accepted.description: Pragmatic product designer with 5+ years of experience designing interfaces for web and mobile applications in devtools, fintech, and crypto products.

plugins.tagline: Merge similar color shades together and connect with variables in 1 click

135408.name: Color cleaner: Merge similar colors & connect with variables
135408.description:
About

Color Cleaner is a plugin designed to help streamline your Figma files not only by reducing the number of colors and minimizing subtle variations of the same shade, but also connecting them with variables.


How to use

Use the “Level of cleanup” slider to adjust how much cleanup is applied. Preview the changes in the box below and choose a setting that balances effectiveness. Typically, aim for a setting that is neither too soft to make a noticeable difference, nor too hard to avoid merging distinct colors.

Toggle the “Match with variables” checkbox if you want colors to be connected with available variables. When ready, click “Clean.” After a brief moment, the changes will be applied to the selected element.

manifest.name: Color cleaner: Merge similar colors & convert to variables

135408.release_notes:
Matching with library variables is shipped! 🎉

What's changed:
• Added a feature of marching colors with variables from connected libraries.
• Removed duplicate entries when colors were transformed into themselves.
• Added tooltips for variable boxes to improve clarity.
• Multiple minor UX fixes.
135408.tagline: Merge similar color shades together and connect with variables in 1 click

plugins.name: Sticky to Shape
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to seamlessly convert FigJam Sticky notes into square shapes with text. It's perfect for organizing brainstorming sessions or visually aligning your ideas.


How to Use:

Select one or more Sticky notes in your FigJam file.

Run the plugin to transform them into square shapes with the same text content.

Customize the resulting shape's color, size, and text properties as needed.


Key Features:

Automatically transforms Sticky notes into square shapes with text.

Retains the original text and formatting.

Helps maintain visual consistency in your FigJam files.

Whether you're collaborating with teammates or organizing your thoughts visually, this plugin simplifies the process and saves time.
plugins.tagline: Transform FigJam Stickies into square shapes with text in just one click.

plugins.name: Component Utility
plugins.description:
Component Utility

A utility plugin for effortlessly cloning and linking component sets.

Demo: https://youtu.be/j6dRKs2V8dQ


Clone Command

Clones the master component and links the selected instances to it.

  1. Select all the instances that need to be linked to new master component, along with the master component to be cloned.
  2. Run the clone command.
  3. A new master component would have been created and all the selected instances are linked to it.


Link Command

Links the selected instances to the designated master component. It can also links detached instances (or a frame containing similar child elements as the master component) and the designated master component.

  1. Select all the instances that need to be linked, along with the master component to which they should be linked to.
  2. Run the link command.
plugins.tagline: A utility plugin for effortlessly cloning and linking component sets.

85242.name: Component Utility
85242.description:

Clone Command

  1. Select all the instances that need to be linked to new master component, along with the master component to be cloned.
  2. Run the clone command.
  3. A new master component would have been created and all the selected instances are linked to it.


Link Command

Links the selected instances to the designated master component. It can also links detached instances (or a frame containing similar child elements as the master component) and the designated master component.

  1. Select all the instances that need to be linked, along with the master component to which they should be linked to.
  2. Run the link command.
85242.release_notes: Added support for dynamic page loading.
85242.tagline: A utility plugin for effortlessly cloning and linking component sets.

plugins.name: Reset Corner Radius
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to reset all rounded corners to 0 in the selected layers with a single click. It works not only on individual layers but also within groups and components, ensuring that any nested layers with rounded corners are also reset.


How to use:

  1. Select a layer or frame.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. All rounded corners in the selected layer and its nested layers will be reset to 0.
plugins.tagline: Reset all rounded corners in selected layers instantly.

122410.name: Reset Corner Radius
122410.description:
This plugin allows you to reset all rounded corners to 0 in the selected layers with a single click. It works not only on individual layers but also within groups and components, ensuring that any nested layers with rounded corners are also reset.


How to use:

  1. Select a layer or frame.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. All rounded corners in the selected layer and its nested layers will be reset to 0.
122410.release_notes: Added: A relaunch button to re-execute the plugin.
122410.tagline: Reset all rounded corners in selected layers instantly.

plugins.description:

"Select Matching Layers" automates this process, allowing you to:

This plugin is perfect for designers managing complex artboards or repetitive tasks. Boost your workflow and make Figma even more efficient!

plugins.name: Summary Sprint
plugins.description:
Summary Sprint is a user-friendly FigJam plugin designed to streamline your sprint planning and tracking—all within your favorite collaborative space. Instantly generate a clear overview of planned, completed, and unfinished tasks, visualized as color-coded cards for quick understanding. Choose the estimation method that best fits your team, from Fibonacci points to hours or any numeric values, ensuring a perfect match for your workflow.


How it Works:


Set Up Your Board:

  1. Add sticky notes (STICKY) with tasks and assign effort values.
  2. Group tasks and place them inside a Section.


Run the Plugin:

  1. Generate the Summary Sprint to view your sprint progress in real-time.
  2. Planned, done, and incomplete tasks are presented in distinct color-coded cards.


Track and Iterate:

  1. Review unplanned work and incomplete tasks to improve future sprints.
  2. Add neutral Notes cards for ideas, dependencies, or clarifications without affecting metrics.


Want to learn more?

Check out our Playground for a deeper explanation and additional tips. With Summary Sprint, you can effortlessly plan, visualize, and refine your sprints directly in FigJam.


Made with ❤️ in Poland.
plugins.tagline: Plan, estimate, and track sprints, visualize progress, reduce overhead, all inside FigJam right now!

118979.release_notes:
Updated Sticky Note Colors after redesign by figma:

Planned: Now uses hex #FFB8A8
Done: Now uses hex #B3EFBD
In Progress: Now uses hex #FFE299
New Sticky Note Type Added:

Introduced a new type with hex #E6E6E6, which behaves identically to the Planned sticky notes.
Core Functionality Remains Unchanged:

The logic for counting and summarizing rectangle points is intact.
118979.tagline: Plan, estimate, and track sprints, visualize progress, reduce overhead, all inside FigJam right now!

plugins.name: Pinwheel Plugin
plugins.description:
Import Design Tokens JSON to Figma variables and Figma styles. Export Figma variables and styles to Design Tokens JSON. Use mode names to create groups for light mode, dark mode, and high contrast variants. Full support for importing and exporting sRGB and Display P3, allowing colors to maintain correct appearance when being moved from Figma to Pinwheel.


It’s a great way to transfer colors, numbers, strings, shadows, and booleans to and from Figma to Pinwheel, or anywhere that can import Design Tokens Community Group formatted JSON.


What's Pinwheel? We’re glad you asked. It’s an amazing app for managing your design system, converting between color formats and color spaces, and automating color contrast testing. If you work with design systems, Pinwheel is for you.

accepted.name: Marc Edwards
accepted.description: Founder and designer at Bjango. Currently building Skala. I also write music. He/him.

accepted.name: Russell Ivanovic
accepted.description: Developer at Bjango. Currently building Skala & Pinwheel. He/him.

plugins.tagline: Import & Export Design Tokens JSON to and from Figma variables and styles.

129730.name: Pinwheel Plugin
129730.description:

Use mode names to create groups for light mode, dark mode, and high contrast variants. Full support for importing and exporting sRGB and Display P3, allowing colors to maintain correct appearance when being moved from Figma to Pinwheel.


It’s a great way to transfer colors, numbers, strings, shadows, and booleans to and from Figma to Pinwheel, or anywhere that can import Design Tokens Community Group formatted JSON.


What's Pinwheel? We’re glad you asked. It’s an amazing app for managing your design system, converting between color formats and color spaces, and automating color contrast testing. If you work with design systems, Pinwheel is for you.
129730.release_notes: Updated import and export to match the latest DTCG specification (https://tr.designtokens.org/color/) implemented in Pinwheel 1.5.3.
129730.tagline: Import & Export Design Tokens JSON to and from Figma variables and styles.

plugins.name: Fonspector
plugins.description:
📝 Overview

Struggling to keep your typography consistent across frames without a design system in place? Fonspector makes it easy. This Figma plugin analyzes your project’s typography, offering instant insights to streamline your workflow. From refining a single frame to auditing an entire design system, Fonspector ensures consistency, identifies missing fonts and styles, and lets you navigate text elements effortlessly—all within your Figma workspace.


👉 Key Features

1. Comprehensive Frame Scanning

2. Multi-Font & Style Management

3. Detect Hidden Layers

4. Navigate to Text Elements


😤 How to Use

1. Select a Frame

2. Launch the Plugin

3. Initiate the Analysis by clicking the “Inspect” button

4. Explore Font Families

5. Navigate to Text Elements


📧 Support and Feedback

I'm excited to share Fonspector with the community as my first-ever plugin developed from scratch! Your feedback is invaluable for improving it. If you run into any issues, have suggestions, or need help, please reach out to me via email or leave a comment.

accepted.name: Harshil Patel
accepted.description: iOS Engineer turned Product Designer, passionate about Design.

plugins.tagline: Fonspector: Bringing Typography Consistency to Every Frame.

plugins.name: AppStore Screenshot Icon Hunter
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin for automatically retrieving and laying out App Store app screenshots.


Key Features

•Support searching for apps by name or App ID

•Automatically fetch high-resolution app screenshots

•Support multiple data sources (App Store API, iTunes Search API)

•Automatically create beautiful layouts

•Display download progress in real time

•Support customizing icon sizes and spacing


Usage

1.Install the plugin in Figma

2.Search for the app by name or App ID

3.Select the target app

4.Configure layout parameters (optional)

5.Click the “Collect & Package” button

6.Wait for screenshot download and layout completion
plugins.tagline: Automatically fetch high-resolution app screenshots&icon

119793.name: AppStore Screenshot Icon Hunter
119793.description:
A Figma plugin for automatically retrieving and laying out App Store app screenshots.

6.Wait for screenshot download and layout completion

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin requires access to a local proxy server to fetch app screenshots from third-party APIs while avoiding CORS issues during development.

plugins.name: Pulpo
plugins.description:
Introducing the Pulpo Plugin for Figma, a powerful tool that seamlessly integrates your Figma files with Pulpo, providing you with a centralized platform to manage all your Figma comments.


With the Pulpo Plugin, you can effortlessly sync multiple Figma files, consolidating all the comments from each file into a single, unified space.


Gone are the days of juggling between different Figma projects to keep track of discussions and feedback. This plugin offers a streamlined workflow, allowing you to visualize and organize all your Figma comments in one convenient location. By bringing together comments from multiple files, you gain a comprehensive overview of the feedback received across your design projects.

Through its intuitive interface, the Pulpo Plugin empowers you to efficiently navigate through your comments, providing seamless access to the context and details of each conversation. You can easily respond to comments, resolve issues, or collaborate with your team members directly from within Pulpo.


With Pulpo's advanced features, you can also assign comments to specific team members, set due dates, and track the progress of discussions, ensuring that all feedback is addressed and actioned upon in a timely manner.


The Pulpo Plugin not only enhances your team's collaboration but also improves your overall design workflow. By centralizing your Figma comments, you can eliminate the need for constant switching between projects, saving you valuable time and effort.


Experience a new level of efficiency and organization with the Pulpo Plugin for Figma. Streamline your comment management process and unlock the full potential of your design collaboration.


For more info visit https://usepulpo.com/
plugins.tagline: All your Figma files comments in one place

plugins.name: Dash Line Rotator
plugins.description: The Dash Line Rotator is a Figma plugin designed to enhance your design workflow by allowing users to easily rotate dashed lines around various shapes. With a user-friendly interface featuring a real-time slider for angle adjustments, this plugin ensures that dashes maintain their alignment and properties while following the contours of rectangles, ellipses, polygons, and pen tool paths. Whether you're creating intricate designs or simple graphics, the Dashed Lines Rotator streamlines the process, providing a seamless experience for designers looking to add dynamic elements to their projects.
plugins.tagline: Works for all shapes

Whether you're creating intricate designs or simple graphics, the Dashed Lines Rotator streamlines the process, providing a seamless experience for designers looking to add dynamic elements to their projects.

plugins.name: Merge Fills
plugins.description: Figma does not offer a built-in way to merge fills from multiple objects, or to easily append fills to an object. This plugin scratches that itch: You can select a number of objects, copy their fill styles, and apply the merged fill style to another object. This will also detach styles from their libraries in the process.
plugins.tagline: Merge Fills From Multiple Nodes Into One

84887.name: Merge Fills
84887.description: Figma does not offer a built-in way to merge fills from multiple objects, or to easily append fills to an object. This plugin scratches that itch: You can select a number of objects, copy their fill styles, and apply the merged fill style to another object. This will also detach styles from their libraries in the process.

plugins.name: Sheets <> Variables
plugins.description:
The Sheets <> Variables plugin empowers designers to integrate dynamic data from Google Sheets directly into Figma. By mapping spreadsheet tabs to variable collections, rows to variables, and columns to modes, this plugin ensures your designs stay up-to-date with your data sources.


Easily manage multilingual content, currency formats, and more, all within Figma.

See use case from https://www.figma.com/community/file/1466349243602774962/sheets-variables-doc


Show your support: Buy me a coffee! Your support means the world! ☕️
plugins.tagline: Seamlessly synchronize your Google Sheets data with Figma variables.

plugins.name: PixelCast: Create aesthetic design timelpases
plugins.description:
PixelCast: Your Fast, Simple Tool for Figma Timelapses

  1. 🎨 Craft Timelapses in 3 Clicks – Perfect for your social media, portfolio, or website
  2. 🎬 One-Click Export – Save and share as video in an instant
  3. 📣 Showcase Your Design Process – Let the world see the journey, not just the result


Static is Boring. Show the Process.

Design isn’t just about the finished product; it’s about every stroke, nudge, and tweak along the way. PixelCast lets you capture each creative choice, each imperfect draft, and every ‘aha’ moment that brings it all together.


A screenshot is worth a 1000 words. A timelapse is worth a 1000 moments. 

We love a good screenshot too, but the real story? That’s in the details—the imperfect ellipses, the text with the font-spacing slightly off, and all the iterations in between. PixelCast lets you share your true design workflow.


How to use the plugin:


  1. Pick a Frame in Figma and click “Start Recording.”
  2. Design Away! Tweak, adjust, polish, and when you’re done, hit “Stop Recording.”
  3. Download Your Timelapse Video ✨


Features


Pixel-Perfect Export

Your timelapse videos look exactly like they do in Figma—click to export, and you’re good to go!


Super Lightweight 

PixelCast videos are optimized for easy sharing on social media with ultra-light file sizes.


Smart Capture 

PixelCast only records changes, so you can take your time to think without filling up frames.


Contact


Got feedback or found a bug? Email us at emailforyash@gmail.com.
plugins.tagline: Beautiful, shareable timelapse videos straight from Figma

plugins.name: Layout Switch
plugins.description:
Layout Switch will help you save 95% of your time in switching your UI layouts from LTR layout to RTL or vise versa! Select how many frames you want and choose your destination layout and click on the button. BOOOOM! all the layouts are changed!

Layout Switch is your ultimate Figma plugin for effortlessly converting designs between left-to-right (LTR) and right-to-left (RTL) layouts. Whether you're adapting English designs for Arabic, Persian, or Hebrew, or flipping RTL layouts back to LTR, this plugin makes the process fast, precise, and hassle-free. With support for multiple frames at once, Layout Switch is the perfect tool for designers working on global projects.


🖼️ Multi-Frame Support:

Select a single frame or a bunch of frames at once! The plugin handles multiple selections effortlessly, making it perfect for large projects with numerous screens or components.


✨ Blazing Fast Conversion:

Transform your designs in seconds—no more wasting time on manual tweaks. Whether you're converting LTR to RTL or RTL to LTR, it’s as fast as a blink!


🛠️ Easy to Use:

No complex settings or learning curves. Just select your frames, choose your direction (LTR to RTL or RTL to LTR), click "Convert," and watch the magic happen. We also have two side-plugins that run directly!


🌍 Bidirectional Flexibility:

Works seamlessly in both directions—convert LTR to RTL for Arabic, Persian, or Hebrew, or flip RTL layouts back to LTR for English or other left-writing languages.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


How It Works:

1.Select Frames: Choose one or multiple frames in your Figma project.

2.Choose Direction: Select whether you want to convert LTR to RTL or RTL to LTR.

3.Click on Change Direction: Run the plugin and let it flip your designs instantly.

4.Review & Polish: Enjoy perfectly adapted layouts, ready for further refinement or delivery.


Note: You save at least 95% your time changing layouts by using Layout Switch. Put your 5% effort on little handy modification😉

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Why Choose Layout Switch?

•Save Time: What used to take hours or days now takes seconds.

•Boost Productivity: Focus on creativity, not manual adjustments.

•Global Reach: Effortlessly design for both LTR and RTL languages, including Arabic, Persian, Hebrew, and more.

•Bidirectional Power: The only plugin you’ll need for flipping designs in both directions.



Perfect For:

•Designers working on multilingual or global projects.

•Teams adapting designs for Arabic, Persian, Hebrew, English, or other bidirectional languages.

•Anyone looking to streamline their Figma workflow and save time.



Get Started Now!

Stop struggling with manual conversions. Layout Switch is here to make your design process faster, smarter, and more efficient. Whether you're flipping LTR to RTL or RTL to LTR, this plugin has you covered. Try it today and see the difference!



Support the Plugin

❤️ Love Layout Switch?

If this plugin has made your design process easier, consider supporting its development with a small donation. Your contribution helps keep the plugin updated and free for everyone!

👉 https://ko-fi.com/sabnouri


Have Questions or Suggestions?


We’d love to hear from you! Whether you have feedback, suggestions for new features, or just need help, feel free to reach out.

📧 Contact Us: sabernooriusb@gmail.com

🌐 Check my website at: https://designbysab.webflow.io
plugins.tagline: LTR or RTL? Switch in a flash—best for Arabic, Persian, and beyond! Convert 1000 frames at a run!

plugins.name: To the top
plugins.description:
This Figma plugin allows me to move any selected objects to the topmost level of Figma page hierarchy, preserving their absolute positions on the canvas. No more manual dragging, dropping, or adjusting coordinates. Ideal for managing complex nested designs and maintaining a tidy layer structure. Less scroll layers, more control where and how you paste stuff.


It enables two use cases:

  1. Move all selected to the top -> cut -> paste in place in any selected frame or group without moving anything.
  2. Free guides and arrows from being cropped by their parent frames, which is helpful when preparing references and when some modals with clipping=on involved.


Differences from similar plugins - this one support multiple objects, and, doesn't move anything anywhere regardless of whatever coordinates starting point😊
plugins.tagline: Move selected elements to the top level of page hierarchy

60986.name: To the top
60986.description:
This Figma plugin allows me to move any selected objects to the topmost level of Figma page hierarchy, preserving their absolute positions on the canvas. No more manual dragging, dropping, or adjusting coordinates. Ideal for managing complex nested designs and maintaining a tidy layer structure. Less scroll layers, more control where and how you paste stuff.


It enables two use cases:

  1. Move all selected to the top -> cut -> paste in place in any selected frame or group without moving anything.
  2. Free guides and arrows from being cropped by their parent frames, which is helpful when preparing references and when some modals with clipping=on involved.


Differences from similar plugins - this one support multiple objects, and, doesn't move anything anywhere regardless of whatever coordinates starting point😊
60986.tagline: Move selected elements to the top level of page hierarchy

plugins.name: Caravage
plugins.description:
Check easily your design contrast accessibility with the 3.0 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines.


About

Caravage allows you to check easily your design contrast accessibility with the 3.0 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines.


You can either select individually any text layer or scan a selection and the plugin will automatically give you for each text:

  1. The colour(s) of the text.
  2. The colour(s) of the background directly behind the text.
  3. The font size and weight of the text.
  4. The contrast value based on WCAG 3.0 (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines) and the new colour contrast method called APCA (Accessible Perceptual Contrast Algorithm).
  5. The minimum contrast value provided by the APCA contrast look up table.


Credits

  1. This plugin was inspired by another plugin called Contrast.
  2. This plugin use the Accessible Perceptual Contrast Algorithm by Andrew Somers.
  3. This plugin use RGBQuant to analyze the colour(s) of the selected text and the background behind it.
  4. This plugin use Figma Plugin DS, a lightweight UI library.
plugins.tagline: Check easily your design contrast accessibility with the 3.0 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines

117095.name: Caravage
117095.description:
Check easily your design contrast accessibility with the 3.0 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines.


About

  3. The font size and weight of the text.
  4. The contrast value based on WCAG 3.0 (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines) and the new colour contrast method called APCA (Accessible Perceptual Contrast Algorithm).
  5. The minimum contrast value provided by the APCA contrast look up table.


Credits

  1. This plugin was inspired by another plugin called Contrast.
  2. This plugin use the Accessible Perceptual Contrast Algorithm by Andrew Somers.
  3. This plugin use RGBQuant to analyze the colour(s) of the selected text and the background behind it.
  4. This plugin use Figma Plugin DS, a lightweight UI library.

117095.tagline: Check easily your design contrast accessibility with the 3.0 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines

plugins.name: SF Symbol Generator
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin to generate static or variable SF Symbol SVGs from your Figma icons that can be imported into the SF Symbols App or directly to Xcode as an asset.

Compatible with SF Symbols 5 and up.


Features

- Convert a single Figma icon to an SF Symbol SVG

- Create variable SF Symbols from three icons (Ultra Light, Regular, and Black)

- Simple interface for selecting icons and assigning weights

- Dynamic attribution in SVG exports with plugin name and version

- Compatible with SF Symbols 5 and later versions

- Smart naming based on parent component or frame names

- The icons width will also be respected in the SF Symbol SVG accordingly

- Interactive SVG Preview with path direction visualization


Usage

1. Select one or more icon layers in your Figma document

2. Open the SF Symbol Generator plugin

3. Click "Scan Selected Icons" to detect your selected icons

4. Choose between Static or Variable mode:

- Static: Select one icon from your selection to create an SF Symbol

- Variable: Assign your icons to Ultra Light, Regular, and Black weights

5. Click "Create SF Symbol" to generate your SF Symbol SVG

accepted.name: Dustin K
accepted.description: A product designer based in Berlin, creating a powerful creative editor at IMG.LY.

plugins.tagline: Generate custom "static" or "variable" SF Symbols directly from Figma.

130017.description:

130017.release_notes:
1.0.0

- Improved visual polish and user experience ✨
- Enhanced SVG preview with layers dropdown to isolate and examine individual paths
- Zoom and pan controls for detailed inspection of SVG paths and nodes

130017.tagline: Generate custom "static" or "variable" SF Symbols directly from Figma.

plugins.name: Numeric Tokens Generator
plugins.description:
Transform your design workflow with a comprehensive design system generator that creates and manages typography, spacing, border radius, and shadow systems - all powered by Figma variables.


Key Features:

📝 Complete Typography System

  1. Generate responsive typography scales with Material Design or Apple HIG guidelines
  2. Smart font pairing validation for optimal readability
  3. Automatic variable creation for font sizes and line heights
  4. Support for custom type scales and base sizes
  5. Responsive typography with desktop, tablet, and mobile variants (Pro)


↔️ Spacing System

  1. Create consistent spacing scales based on 4px or 8px grids
  2. Generate spacing variables for margins, padding, and layout
  3. Customizable number of spacing increments
  4. Visual preview of spacing values


⚪ Border Radius System

  1. Build systematic border radius scales
  2. Customizable base radius and increments
  3. Visual preview of radius values
  4. Perfect for maintaining consistent component shapes


🎭 Shadow System

  1. Create elevation-based shadow systems
  2. Customizable shadow properties (color, blur, spread)
  3. Visual angle control for consistent light sources
  4. Perfect for depth and hierarchy


📤 Export Options

  1. Web: CSS, SCSS, JSON
  2. Mobile: React Native, Flutter, Android XML, Swift
  3. Variables-first approach for easy updates
  4. Cross-platform consistency


📚 Auto-Documentation

  1. Generate visual documentation for your design system
  2. Automatic style guides with examples
  3. Clear naming conventions
  4. Easy team handoff


🔄 Smart Updates

  1. Detect existing settings
  2. Update system-wide changes through variables
  3. Maintain consistency across your design files


Perfect for design system creators, UI designers, and teams looking to maintain consistent, scalable design systems across web and mobile platforms.

accepted.name: Maher Fayad
accepted.description: Senior UX Designer | Transforming Products. Empowering Leaders. 40+ Success Stories. Let's Innovate Together.

plugins.tagline: Typography, Radius, Tokens Generator, Variables, Numeric Tokes, Design system

119015.name: Numeric Tokens Generator
119015.description:
Transform your design workflow with a comprehensive design system generator that creates and manages typography, spacing, border radius, and shadow systems - all powered by Figma variables.


Key Features:

📝 Complete Typography System

  1. Generate responsive typography scales with Material Design or Apple HIG guidelines
  2. Smart font pairing validation for optimal readability
  3. Automatic variable creation for font sizes and line heights
  4. Support for custom type scales and base sizes
  5. Responsive typography with desktop, tablet, and mobile variants (Pro)


↔️ Spacing System

  1. Create consistent spacing scales based on 4px or 8px grids
  2. Generate spacing variables for margins, padding, and layout
  3. Customizable number of spacing increments
  4. Visual preview of spacing values


⚪ Border Radius System

  1. Build systematic border radius scales
  2. Customizable base radius and increments
  3. Visual preview of radius values
  4. Perfect for maintaining consistent component shapes


🎭 Shadow System

  1. Create elevation-based shadow systems
  2. Customizable shadow properties (color, blur, spread)
  3. Visual angle control for consistent light sources
  4. Perfect for depth and hierarchy


📤 Export Options

  1. Web: CSS, SCSS, JSON
  2. Mobile: React Native, Flutter, Android XML, Swift
  3. Variables-first approach for easy updates
  4. Cross-platform consistency


📚 Auto-Documentation

  1. Generate visual documentation for your design system
  2. Automatic style guides with examples
  3. Clear naming conventions
  4. Easy team handoff


🔄 Smart Updates

  1. Detect existing settings
  2. Update system-wide changes through variables
  3. Maintain consistency across your design files


Perfect for design system creators, UI designers, and teams looking to maintain consistent, scalable design systems across web and mobile platforms.
119015.tagline: Typography, Radius, Tokens Generator, Variables, Numeric Tokes, Design system

plugins.name: Invoice Generator
plugins.description:
Create professional invoices directly in Figma with this easy-to-use plugin. Features include:

  1. Multi-currency support (USD, EUR, GBP, NGN, INR, CNY)
  2. Clean, modern A4 layout
  3. Customizable company and client details
  4. Line item support with automatic total calculation
  5. Footer with terms
plugins.tagline: Professional Invoice Generator with Multiple Currency Support

plugins.name: Designer Starter Kit
plugins.description:
Start your design projects with a consistent structure. This plugin helps new designers build out essential project pages quickly and efficiently, ensuring uniformity across files. Customize page names, order, and background colors, and even save up to five configurations for future projects.


—


How to Use?

  1. Input the desired names for each page.
  2. Add, remove or reorganize pages as needed.
  3. Save your setup as a configuration for later use or stick with the default.


*Included a basic structure for Design Systems & Design Research


—


Made with ❤️ in México using Cursor AI and Claude 3.5. Feedback is appreciated —thank you!
plugins.tagline: A starter kit structure to build fast with consistency

plugins.name: Simple Pomodoro
plugins.description:
🍅 Simple Pomodoro: Your Design Sidekick 🎨

Hey there, productivity ninja! Ready to slice through your design tasks like a hot knife through butter? Say hello to Simple Pomodoro – your new secret weapon in the battle against procrastination and creative blocks.

This sleek, no-nonsense timer is here to supercharge your workflow:


  1. 25-minute focus sprints to keep you in the zone
  2. Clean, distraction-free interface that won't cramp your style


Whether you're crafting pixel-perfect icons or wrestling with complex layouts, Simple Pomodoro's got your back.

Crush deadlines, conquer creative challenges, and make burnout a thing of the past.


With Simple Pomodoro, you're not just designing, you're designing like a boss.

Ready to level up your Figma game? Hit that install button and let's get those creative juices flowing! 🚀✨


Get in touch:

X (twitter)

Dribbble

Behance

Linkedin

accepted.name: Mehdi Mirzaie
accepted.description: Passionate product designer pushing limits, captivating hearts and minds.

plugins.tagline: Simple Pomodoro Timer: Your Design Sidekick

plugins.name: Rename Layers with Prefix
plugins.description:
This is a simple utility that just renames selected layers, adds the prefix you put in the text box, and will add sequential numbers as in the screenshot.






P.S. Hi Tracy!
plugins.tagline: Rename Layers with a prefix and add sequential numbers

plugins.name: Dynogee Image Rendering API
plugins.description:
Dynogee is an easy and quick tool to expose your Figma designs as an API:


  1. ✨ Swap text and images with dynamic content
  2. 📐 Create pixel perfect copies of your design
  3. 🏎️ Supa-fast rendering times, render images on-the-fly
  4. 🚀 We thought of it: custom fonts, truncation, i18n, you name it


It’s like Figma's Export feature, but as an API. 💫


How to use the plugin


  1. Select a frame in Figma, and open the plugin
  2. Define layers for which you want to provide content via the API
  3. Create your template 🚀


Pro tip: Set a max height on text layers to enforce truncation. ✂️


Features


Full creative freedom

Use your brand fonts, colors and more to create high-fidelity dynamic images ✨


Fast rendering

Our backend is optimized to generate and distribute your images without long wait times. Often images are generated in as little as 200ms.


Handoff your templates to developers

Each template your create comes with it's own documentation and playground environment, making it trivial for your engineering team to make use of the image rendering API.


Contact


If you want to share your feedback, please reach out to us at support@dynogee.com.
plugins.tagline: Turn your Figma frames into an image rendering API

plugins.name: pmcopilot.ai - Diagram Exporter
plugins.description: Expand your capabilities by exporting Figma diagrams to your Product Management copilot. You can quickly draw workflows, processes and new functionalities, export the diagram to pmcopilot.ai and translate them into Functional Requirements, User Stories and Epics.
plugins.tagline: Export your FigJam diagrams to pmcopilot.ai

62386.name: pmcopilot.ai - Diagram Exporter
62386.description: Expand your capabilities by exporting Figma diagrams to your Product Management copilot. You can quickly draw workflows, processes and new functionalities, export the diagram to pmcopilot.ai and translate them into Functional Requirements, User Stories and Epics.

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin sends extracted FigJam diagram information to pmcopilot.ai platform for further processing.

62386.tagline: Export your FigJam diagrams to pmcopilot.ai

plugins.name: Wheel of Random
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you spin a customizable wheel of fortune and randomly select one of the values you define. It’s perfect for running design sprints, choosing ideas, assigning tasks, or simply having fun during team activities.


You can enter any custom list of options — names, categories, priorities — and the wheel will visually animate the selection. The selected result can optionally appear on the canvas as a text object or styled label.


Ideal for design teams, workshop facilitators, educators, and anyone who needs a playful way to randomize decisions inside Figma or FigJam.
plugins.tagline: Spin the wheel and pick a random result — perfect for decision-making, games, and workshops.

plugins.name: Illustration Exporter
plugins.description: This plugin allows you to easily export illustrations from Figma and view a preview before saving. Additionally, the file and folder naming is optimized to avoid repetition, ensuring that each file is stored in neatly organized folders.
plugins.tagline: A plugin for exporting illustrations with preview and organized naming

129668.name: Illustration Exporter
129668.description: This plugin allows you to easily export illustrations from Figma and view a preview before saving. Additionally, the file and folder naming is optimized to avoid repetition, ensuring that each file is stored in neatly organized folders.
129668.release_notes:
Image Export Optimization

New Features:
- Set fixed 95% quality for best results
- Reduced file sizes without quality loss

UI Improvements:
- New design with fixed dimensions
- Better image preview display
- Removed scrolling for better user experience

Technical Improvements:
- Better compression algorithm
- Shows file size reduction
- Better error handling
- Optimized memory usage

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed image compression issues
- Fixed file size increase problems

Note: This update works with previous versions and provides better quality and performance.
129668.tagline: A plugin for exporting illustrations with preview and organized naming
